text: Suthrond canâ€™t afford to lose his beloved champion, so he bestows his gifts on Valbrand.
The sturdiest of norsemen may call themselves among Valbrand's retinue.
Blessed by Suthrond the Dragonblade is as massive as it is deadly.
With a powerful shout, smite and stomp Valbrand wades in to battle, crushing all dare step in his path.
